faqs.question: What types of documentation should I verify before buying a flat in Babyal
faqs.answer: Verification is crucial. Key documents to check include the Occupancy Certificate OC or Completion Certificate CC issued by the local municipal body, the Registered Sale Deed, the building plan approval from relevant authorities, and the developer's RERA registration certificate. If you are buying a resale flat, ensure the seller has all past chain documents and clearance of all maintenance and utility bills up to the date of sale.
